last_episode_to_air.name: We've Reached the End
last_episode_to_air.overview: On an escape to Mexico, Jen and Judy face the past and make decisions about the future as they forever cement their ride-or-die friendship.

name: Dead to Me
overview: A hotheaded widow searching for the hit-and-run driver who mowed down her husband befriends an eccentric optimist who isn't quite what she seems.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Jen and Judy are not OK. Not even a little. With their lives spinning out of control, they're clinging to each other â€” and their secrets.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: A hit-and-run started it all for Jen and Judy. Now another shocking crash alters the future of their ride-or-die friendship. All roads have led to this.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Overwhelmed by grief and anger after her husband's sudden death, acerbic real estate agent Jen meets tenderhearted Judy at a support group.

episodes.name: Maybe I'm Crazy
episodes.overview: Amid her escalating rage over the stalled investigation into her husband's death, Jen becomes more entangled in Judy's messy personal life.

episodes.name: It's All My Fault
episodes.overview: On what would have been her husband's 50th birthday, Jen clashes with her disapproving mother-in-law over the best way to mark the occasion.

episodes.name: I Can't Go Back
episodes.overview: When Jen discovers that her late husband harbored a devastating secret, she enlists Judy's help in tracking down more information.

episodes.name: I've Gotta Get Away
episodes.overview: A grief retreat in Palm Springs gives Jen a chance to move on and cut loose under the watchful eye of Judy, who soon follows her friend's lead.

episodes.name: Oh My God
episodes.overview: Jen realizes her sons aren't coping with their dad's death as well as she thought they were. Judy joins Nick as he investigates the hit-and-run.

episodes.name: I Can Handle It
episodes.overview: A break in the case and a crushing business setback leave Jen shaken. Judy and Steve take care of unfinished business.

episodes.name: Try to Stop Me
episodes.overview: Jen makes a reckless decision after Nick narrows down the list of potential suspects, and Judy feels renewed hope over her relationship with Steve.

episodes.name: I Have to Be Honest
episodes.overview: As Jen's life begins to crumble personally and professionally, she reveals her darkest secret to Judy, who does some confessing of her own.

episodes.name: You Have to Go
episodes.overview: Armed with the truth about her husband's death, Jen demands justice. Meanwhile, Judy's attempt to make amends causes all sorts of problems for Steve.

episodes.name: You Know What You Did
episodes.overview: As Jen and Judy grapple with the distressing events of the night before, Jen soon realizes that eyes â€” and ears â€” are everywhere in her neighborhood.

episodes.name: Where Have You Been
episodes.overview: Rattled when an old acquaintance of Judy's turns up asking questions about Steve, Jen prepares for the worst. Detective Perez's suspicions grow.

episodes.name: You Can't Live Like This
episodes.overview: Jen and Judy disagree over how to handle the situation with Steve, but when the threat of being ratted out hits close to home, a risky plan takes shape.

episodes.name: Between You and Me
episodes.overview: Jen and Judy try to dig their way out of trouble during a trip out of town, but their cathartic weekend away comes to an abrupt end over tragic news.

episodes.name: The Price You Pay
episodes.overview: A sore back, money worries and a busybody neighbor push Jen to seek relief from the last person she expects. Judy connects with a kindred spirit.

episodes.name: You Don't Have To
episodes.overview: Jen scrambles to contain the fallout from Charlie's vehicular hijinks, Judy faces questions about Steve, and Henry experiences a case of stage fright.

episodes.name: If Only You Knew
episodes.overview: Judy receives a rude awakening after a romantic night, while Jen looks to make a positive contribution to the community â€” and a client.

episodes.name: It Had to Be You
episodes.overview: Jen feels conflicted over a real estate deal. The damage from Charlie's joyride piles up. Judy reaches out to Michelle and runs into Detective Perez.

episodes.name: It's Not You, It's Me
episodes.overview: Filled with guilt and regret, Jen finds a civic-minded way to unleash some pent-up feelings. Judy revisits her past. The police uncover a new lead.

episodes.name: Where Do We Go from Here
episodes.overview: Determined to protect her family, Jen tries to come clean about Steve's whereabouts, but the situation veers in an unexpected direction thanks to Judy.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Jen and Judy are not OK. Not even a little. With their lives spinning out of control, they're clinging to each other â€” and their secrets.

episodes.name: We've Been Here Before
episodes.overview: The painful aftermath of the hit-and-run brings up bad memories for Jen as Judy receives shocking news about Steve. Ben pieces his memory back together.

episodes.name: We Need to Talk
episodes.overview: As Jen works up the nerve to tell Judy what the doctor found, Charlie demands answers, Ben's guilt eats away at him, and the cops turn up with questions.

episodes.name: Look at What We Have Here
episodes.overview: While awaiting the test results, Jen and Judy learn more about the investigation into Steve's death, and a little bird prompts Nick to approach Ben.

episodes.name: Where Do We Go Now?
episodes.overview: A funeral sets the tone for a day that has Judy receiving bad news and reconnecting with a former friend, while Jen attempts to comfort a despondent Ben.

episodes.name: We Didn't Think This Through
episodes.overview: Jen deals with plumbing problems and an impromptu party. Judy keeps a life-changing decision to herself. Ben falls headlong into a grief spiral.

episodes.name: We're Gonna Beat This Thing
episodes.overview: Jen mobilizes to support Judy, drawing on everything she learned from her mother. Nick's tenacity over a piece of evidence raises concerns for Perez.

episodes.name: Can We Be Honest?
episodes.overview: Reeling from the doctor's visit, a poncho-clad Jen wrestles with how to tell Judy. Ben looks to make amends by coming clean, and Nick confronts Perez.

episodes.name: We'll Find a Way
episodes.overview: Jen juggles selling the house next door with anxiety over the FBI investigation as Judy tries to live in denial for a little while longer.

episodes.name: We're Almost Out of Time
episodes.overview: Judy may be ready to face the future, but her BFF isn't. Hot on the heels of a tearful admission, Jen scrambles to secure a Hail Mary option.

episodes.name: We've Reached the End
episodes.overview: On an escape to Mexico, Jen and Judy face the past and make decisions about the future as they forever cement their ride-or-die friendship.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: A hit-and-run started it all for Jen and Judy. Now another shocking crash alters the future of their ride-or-die friendship. All roads have led to this.
